overview_of_class: This is the laboratory course associated with CHEM 103-CN General Physical Chemistry. In the course, chemistry laboratory techniques are applied to biosensor technology using concepts of acid-base chemistry, kinetics, and the like. The design of a biosensor is covered as well. The course includes planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on these experiments. Credit for this course is 0.34 units. Enrollment is concurrent with CHEM 103-CN.
name: General Physical Chemistry Laboratory
subject: CHEM
